messages.subject: Bouncing list emails
messages.msgSnippet: literally tons ? Tons is a weight, not a
messages.messageBody:
<< Yahoogroups is the largest email list provider (pay or free) and they send
out literally tons of mail. >>

"literally tons"? "Tons" is a weight, not a volume. "Literally" should not be
there if the "tons" is referring to volume (which it is)! :-)

Anyway, yes, this (not getting all/any/some/most list emails) has been an
ongoing problem for me with two other lists I'm on for the past month. If you
(whoever's reading this) wants to make sure not to miss anything, then just
go to Yahoo Groups, and read the posts there (that are all kept permanently
in archives, even if the posts got bounced from reaching your particular
box). HTH, Lara............
